data.name: Robotpencil Presents: Alien Portrait Demo
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

In this video tutorial, I'll cover how to go about an interesting creature/alien/monster portrait. The topics I'll cover are:

  • Go wild with the shapes
  • Push anatomy and features
  • Don't be afraid of mistakes use them
data.about_the_game:
In this video tutorial, I'll cover how to go about an interesting creature/alien/monster portrait. The topics I'll cover are:

data.short_description: This is a tutorial on how to create a creature/alien/monster portrait.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
